text: taruvaya navu bennu bennige nam'ma dutarannu kalisidevu. Pratiyondu samudayadavaru tam'ma balige tam'ma dutanu bandaga atanannu tiraskarisidaru. Navu avarannu obbara hinde innobbarante nillisidevu mattu navu avarellarannu kevala kategalagi marpadisi bittevu. (Satyavannu) nambada janangagalige vinasa kadide
